Module AdrenalinaGame
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class AdrenalinaMatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.AdrenalinaMatch
  • public class AdrenalinaMatch
extends java.lang.Object
    Main match class that stores and manages game data One AdrenalinaMatch represents one game match

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdrenalinaMatch

        public AdrenalinaMatch​(int nPlayers,
                       int maxDeaths,
                       int turnDuration,
                       int mapID)
        Parameters:
        nPlayers - number of players [3,5].
        maxDeaths - maximum number of deaths before frenzy. the same as skulls in the manual
        turnDuration - max duration of a turn in seconds.
        mapID - id of map to play [1,4].

      • getSelectablePlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getSelectablePlayers​(Player caller,
                                                   java.lang.String from,
                                                   int notID,
                                                   int minDistance,
                                                   int maxDistance,
                                                   java.util.List<Player> targetPlayers)
        Parameters:
        caller - player requesting the selection
        from - string code identifying type of selecatble players: (VISIBLE, NOT_VISIBLE, TARGET_VISIBLE, DIRECTION, PREV_TARGET, #[playerid], ATTACKER, DAMAGED
        notID - id to exclude
        minDistance - minimum distance between caller and target
        maxDistance - maximum distance between caller and target (-1 if no max is required)
        targetPlayers - list of players for PREV_TARGET or TARGET_VISIBLE
        Returns:
        List with players that satisfy query

      • getSelectableCells

        public java.util.List<Cell> getSelectableCells​(Player caller,
                                               java.lang.String from,
                                               int notID,
                                               int minDistance,
                                               int maxDistance,
                                               java.util.List<Player> targetPlayers)
        Parameters:
        caller - player requesting the selection
        from - string code identifying type of selecatble players: (VISIBLE, NOT_VISIBLE, TARGET_VISIBLE, DIRECTION, DIRECTION_VISIBLE, #[playerid], ATTACKER, DAMAGED
        notID - id to exclude
        minDistance - minimum distance between caller and target
        maxDistance - maximum distance between caller and target (-1 if no max is required)
        targetPlayers - list of players for PREV_TARGET or TARGET_VISIBLE
        Returns:
        List with cells that satisfy query
